edu.vt.middleware.password
Interface PasswordRule

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDigestRule, AbstractPasswordRule, PasswordCharacterRule, PasswordDictionaryRule, PasswordHistoryRule, PasswordLengthRule, PasswordSequenceRule, PasswordSourceRule, PasswordUserIDRule, PasswordWhitespaceRule
public interface PasswordRule

PasswordRule allows custom password rules to be created for determining whether or not a password is strong.

Version:
$Revision: 186 $ $Date: 2009-05-05 23:21:58 -0400 (Tue, 05 May 2009) $
Author:
Middleware Services

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getMessage()
          This returns the reason the supplied password did not meet the requirements of this rule.
 void setMessage(java.lang.String msg)
          This sets the reason the supplied password did not meet the requirements of this rule.
 boolean verifyPassword(Password password)
          This returns whether or not the supplied password meets the requirements of this rule.
 

Method Detail

verifyPassword

boolean verifyPassword(Password password)
This returns whether or not the supplied password meets the requirements of this rule.

Parameters:
password - Password to verify
Returns:
boolean - whether password passes the rule

getMessage

java.lang.String getMessage()
This returns the reason the supplied password did not meet the requirements of this rule. Returns null if all requirements have been met.

Returns:
String - the reason the supplied password did not meet the requirements of this rule

setMessage

void setMessage(java.lang.String msg)
This sets the reason the supplied password did not meet the requirements of this rule.

Parameters:
msg - String - the reason the supplied password did not meet the requirements of this rule
